text: The page isn't published yet :confused:
<@UTQQ4TXCH> I tried .hsForm_c947ee0d-662b-48a1-a5ab-dc1xxxxxxxxxxx but didn't get anything. this is what I want the form to look like...any idea how to get this?
can I access it?
Can you share the css code you are trying to use

It's a figma file so here's the tree for the form. it goes from bottom to the top. so the button is the "Request Demo" and Frame 6514 is the email label and placeholder and the input is for the email box
this is for the last name then first name
and there is css at every level
this is for the whole module including the image and form
this is for the form including the title
this is just for the input boxes and submit button
this is the button not including text
this is for the email input box, not including the CaretDown vector or text
this is for the first and last name boxes, not including the vector or text
Sorry but I’m not familiar with Figma.
the first image I sent you is like the html structure of the form
Are you having targeting elements such as background? Not really sure what the main problem is you are having?
Here is an example of how I’m targeting a submit button to design it

You will target things such as “submit” but that is generic all buttons will have that so you need to find a unique an ” id” to target it first or it will affect all buttons that have the same inputs.
I really only need a transparent background so the image can come through
Is there a color being added somewhere?
How about background-color: transparent;
yes the background color is background: #F8BC00;
I'll try transparent though too
Or just remove background: #F8BC00;
the figma file is just a wire frame with the css designs. I've been customizing the HubSpot site to match the figma file
Can I see the module you created for your form?
I’m headed out on a hike for a few hours but glad to answer any questions when I get back. By the way that code probably won’t help this is from a new theme I built.
thank you so much. and no worries, I just want to see how you have your laid out and such. I'll message you if I have more questions. Have a great hike!
